CustomField.description: A description of the External Status code value
CustomField.formula: CASE( External_Status_Current__c, 'A', 'Authorization Prohibited', 'B', 'Bankrupt', 'C', 'Closed', 'E', 'Revoked', 'F', 'Frozen', 'I', 'Interest Accrual Prohibited', 'L', 'Lost', 'U', 'Stolen', 'Z', 'Charged Off', 'Normal Status')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A description of the External Status code value
CustomField.label: External Status Description
